client.model

Class ModelHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.model.ModelHelper

  • public class ModelHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to perform certain operations used by both the game model and the AI.

    • Constructor Summary

      ModelHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • getRounds

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> getRounds()
        Returns the List of Booleans determining when Mr X is visible. Only the advanced version of the game is supported at this time.
        Returns:
        the List of Booleans determining when Mr X is visible.

      • getPlayerOfColour

        public static GamePlayer getPlayerOfColour(java.util.List<GamePlayer> players,
                                           Colour colour)
        Returns the GamePlayer object of the specified player from a List.
        Parameters:
        players - the List of GamePlayer objects.
        colour - the player whose GamePlayer object is to be returned.
        Returns:
        the GamePlayer object of the specified player from a List.

      • getNextPlayer

        public static GamePlayer getNextPlayer(java.util.List<GamePlayer> players,
                                       GamePlayer currentPlayer)
        Returns the GamePlayer object of the player whose turn it is next.
        Parameters:
        players - the List of GamePlayer objects for all players in the game.
        currentPlayer - the GamePlayer object of the current player in the game.
        Returns:
        the GamePlayer object of the player whose turn it is next.

      • getWinningPlayers

        public static java.util.Set<Colour> getWinningPlayers(java.util.List<GamePlayer> players,
                                                      Colour currentPlayer,
                                                      <any> graph,
                                                      java.lang.Integer round)
        Returns the Set of players who have won the game.
        Parameters:
        players - the List of players in the game.
        currentPlayers - the current player in the game.
        graph - the Graph associated with the game.
        rounds - the List of Booleans that decide when Mr X is visible.
        round - the current round of the game.
        Returns:
        the Set of players who have won the game.

      • detectivesNoValidMoves

        public static boolean detectivesNoValidMoves(java.util.List<GamePlayer> players,
                                             <any> graph)
        Returns true if all detectives have no valid Moves.
        Parameters:
        players - the List of players in the game.
        graph - the Graph associated with the game.
        Returns:
        true if all detectives have no valid Moves.

      • onMrX

        public static boolean onMrX(java.util.List<GamePlayer> players)
        Returns true if a detective shares the same Node as Mr X.
        Parameters:
        players - the List of players in the game.
        Returns:
        true if a detective shares the same Node as Mr X.

      • validMoves

        public static java.util.Set<Move> validMoves(GamePlayer gamePlayer,
                                             java.util.List<GamePlayer> players,
                                             <any> graph)
        Returns the Set of valid Moves a player can make.
        Parameters:
        gamePlayer - the player for whom to generate the Set of valid Moves.
        players - the List of players in the game.
        graph - the Graph associated with the game.
        Returns:
        the Set of valid Moves a player can make.

      • getTickets

        public static java.util.Map<Ticket,java.lang.Integer> getTickets(Colour player,
                                                                 ScotlandYardView model)
        Returns the Map of Tickets for a specified player.
        Parameters:
        player - the player whose Tickets are to be returned.
        model - the ScotlandYardView which contains the players information.
        Returns:
        the Map of Tickets for a specified player.
